sentences.sContent: A clarinet and bassoon and other instruments start playing.
sentences.sContent_eng: A clarinet and bassoon and other instruments start playing.
sentences.sCn: 随后，单簧管，低音管和其它乐器也开始了演奏。

trans.tranOther: a musical instrument like a very long wooden tube, that produces a low sound. You hold it upright and play it by blowing into a thin curved metal pipe.
